descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

friendlyName.name: friendlyName
friendlyName.description: The friendly name of the status page
friendlyName.ai_hint: The friendly name of the status page

type.name: type
type.description: The type of the maintenance window
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

url.name: url
url.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the public status page
id.ai_hint: The ID of the public status page

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: psps
options.description: Public status pages IDs separated with dash, e.g. 236-1782-4790

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: custom_domain
options.description: The domain or subdomain that the status page will run on

options.name: friendly_name
options.description: The friendly name of the status page

options.name: monitors
options.description: Monitor IDs to be displayed in status page (the values are separated with a dash (-) or 0 for all monitors)

options.name: password
options.description: The password for the status page

options.name: sort
options.description: The sorting of the status page

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

value.name: value
value.description: The correspondent value for the alert contact type
value.ai_hint: The correspondent value for the alert contact type

weekDay.name: weekDay
weekDay.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

monitors.name: monitors
monitors.description: Monitor IDs to be displayed in status page (the values are separated with a dash (-) or 0 for all monitors)
monitors.ai_hint: Monitor IDs to be displayed in status page (the values are separated with a dash (-) or 0 for all monitors)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: custom_domain
options.description: The domain or subdomain that the status page will run on

options.name: password
options.description: The password for the status page

options.name: sort
options.description: The sorting of the status page

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'account' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'monitor' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'monitor' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'friendlyName'
IF resource == 'monitor' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'monitor' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'monitor' AND operation IN ["delete", "reset", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'monitor' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'monitor' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'monitor' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'monitor' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'monitor' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'alertContact' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'alertContact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'friendlyName'
IF resource == 'alertContact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'alertContact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF resource == 'alertContact' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'alertContact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'alertContact' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'alertContact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'alertContact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'alertContact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'duration'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'friendlyName'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'weekDay'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'create' AND type == 4 THEN SHOW parameter 'monthDay'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'start_time'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'duration'
IF resource == 'maintenanceWindow' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF type == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'weekDay'
IF type == 4 THEN SHOW parameter 'monthDay'
IF resource == 'publicStatusPage' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'publicStatusPage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'friendlyName'
IF resource == 'publicStatusPage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'monitors'
IF resource == 'publicStatusPage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'publicStatusPage' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'publicStatusPage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'publicStatusPage' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'publicStatusPage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'publicStatusPage' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'publicStatusPage' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
